references.paper_title: Product design using point-cloud surfaces: A recursive subdivision technique for point parameterization
references.reason: This paper is foundational in the field of point cloud surface parameterization, providing a recursive subdivision technique that has influenced many subsequent approaches.

references.paper_title: Shape reconstruction by learning differentiable surface representations
references.reason: This work introduces the concept of learning differentiable surface representations, significantly advancing the field and becoming highly influential in neural surface parameterization.

references.paper_title: Free-boundary conformal parameterization of point clouds
references.reason: This paper addresses the challenge of free-boundary conformal parameterization, which is crucial for many applications and has advanced the state-of-the-art in handling complex topologies.

references.paper_title: A papier-mâché approach to learning 3d surface generation
references.reason: This paper introduces the influential 'papier-mâché' approach, a novel method for learning 3D surface generation that has significantly impacted neural surface parameterization methods.

references.paper_title: Least squares conformal maps for automatic texture atlas generation
references.reason: This seminal work laid the groundwork for many subsequent approaches to surface parameterization by introducing the concept of least squares conformal maps.
